remarks: Disjunction distributes over implication.  The forward direction, ~ pm2.76 , is valid intuitionistically.  The reverse direction holds if ` ph ` is decidable, as can be seen at ~ pm2.85dc .  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 1-Apr-2018.)
statement: orimdidc $p |- ( DECID ph -> ( ( ph \/ ( ps -> ch ) ) <-> ( ( ph \/ ps ) -> ( ph \/ ch ) ) ) ) $.
